evidence.claim: QHR integrates with AWS for cloud services.
QHR adheres to HIPAA compliance for data security and patient information protection.
QHR utilizes FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare.
QHR employs RESTful APIs for data sharing between applications.
QHR incorporates HL7 for healthcare data exchange protocols.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of X12 transaction handling or API automation found.
